relationships.description: Harry is the heir of Slytherin, as mentioned in the text: 'The heir of Slytherin's one, too.'
Professor McGonagall will be in the staff room, as mentioned in the text: 'Let's go to the staff room... She'll be there in ten minutes.'
Harry and Ron are friends, as they are working together to figure out what to do.
Professor McGonagall has authority over the students, as mentioned in the text: 'All students to return to their house dormitories at once.'
Harry is connected to the Basilisk, as it has been controlling the school.
